thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: George Spartalis
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 George Spartalis

author: George Spartalis
title: George Spartalis
text: So far I am very satisfied with banggood.com. All the items I have ordered are good quality products and always arrive in good condition. I work in the pastry industry, so I usually order pastry and baking equipment via banggood. Banggood's prices are much cheaper than other stores. I undoubtedly recommend banggood to everyone!
